links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,-1,1,-1,-1,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x^3) / (1 - x^2)^2 / (1 - x^4), {x, 0, 60}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 24 2013 *)LinearRecurrence[{1,1,-1,1,-1,-1,1},{1,0,2,1,4,2,6},70] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 23 2015 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [Floor((n^2+5*n+13+3*(n+1)*(-1)^n)/16): n in [0..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 24 2013(PARI) a(n)=((n^2+5*n+13+3*(n+1)*(-1)^n))\16 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 11 2015
